document_data.mainbody:
Finn Estelmer was a member of the Estelmer noble family of Waterdeep in the midâ€“14 century DR.Finn Estelmer may be the same person as Fenn Estelmer, a member of the family appearing in the comics "Dark of the Moon" and "Summer in the City".
He was the eldest son and heir of the family patriarch Guldos Estelmer by 1368 DR and through 1372 DR.
